Max-Width

# Max-Width

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                    | Support        |
| ------------------------ | -------------- |
| ```
max-w-0
```          | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
max-w-[n]
```        | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
max-w-{n}
```        | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
max-w-full
```       | âœ… Full Support |
| ```

```  | âœ… Full Support |
| ```

```  | âœ… Full Support |
| ```

```  | âœ… Full Support |
| ```

```  | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
max-w-screen-2xl
``` | âœ… Full Support |

max-w-min
